snippet.title: Captain Lycop: Invasion of the Heters Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: https://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/captain-lycop-invasion-of-the-heters.html


Mankind has received a transmission from space. An alien ship is coming. A hardened officer has been chosen to assess the danger. Dive into the heart of Captain Lycop: Invasion of the Heters, a space shooter mixing adventure, action and management. Face off against pen-pushing insects, merciless enemies and epic bosses. Discover an alien universe with its own rules, mixing friendly yet annoying pacifists, administrators with little regard for your future, and conquerors with no morals. With a wide tech tree, replay the adventure with varying strategies choosing among 31 different technologies. The outcome of the adventure will depend on your choices. Your only hope is to banish all cowardice and follow a virtuous path.
